title: AI-Powered Task Management Application
description: A web-based productivity platform leveraging AI for task scheduling, featuring real-time chat, social feed, distributed file storage, role-based dashboards, and Microsoft Outlook integration for enhanced workflow efficiency.

title: NEG AI Banking Platform
description: A secure, scalable digital banking solution for Nigeria, built with MongoDB, Flutterwave, and Express.js. Features include digital wallets, real-time balance checks, instant transfers, bill payments, JWT-based authentication, and webhook support for seamless transactions.

title: Fraud Detection Research
description: A research project investigating fraud’s impact on Nigeria’s digital economy, proposing AI/ML-based solutions using anomaly detection and data analysis to enhance security.
